item.title: How I Use tmux
item.description: This post explores a bit about integrating tmux into my workflow on MacOS and the Windows Subsystem for Linux. Over time, I’ve built up a set of configurations that work well together for me. Because they’re in a git repo, they’re available anywhere I can access github, and I can track any changes I make immediately. I don’t recommend copying my dotfiles exactly. Instead, I’d recommend picking and choosing a few things at a time to add, so that there’s time to get used to any new changes.
